name: Hand-painted_Black_Gold_Accent_Chest
reviews: I am very happy with this accent chest. It was easy to put together and looks great in my foyer.

Oh, my! What a lovely piece of furniture/artistry!Do I prefer handcrafted/quality wood over a wannabe manufactured in China? Yes, indeed I do… and I have many such Made in the U.S.A. extraordinary/dearly-priced furnishings gracing my charming home.This elegant chest fits in beautifully amidst the American-made and my antique treasures.It is a substantial, well-constructed piece that is easily assembled in quick order. A showstopper in my entryway. I have no regrets.
I am pleased with the table; it is exactly as advertised. Assembly was simple.
description: This hand painted black and gold finish accent chest features a door and lower shelf for storage.
